name: Age
description:
This is a happy game.

Game gameplay:

1. Various colored balls will appear in front of the player, and you need to shoot balls of the same color to eliminate them

2. We must aim as much as possible and grasp the angle, otherwise we will waste an opportunity to eliminate it in vain

4. Super relaxed gameplay, fun and effortless, with diverse scenes to alleviate your visual fatigue

5. Super fun and fun elimination gameplay, it's great to pass your leisure time and find ways to complete your challenges.

6. Activate your ultimate brain power, enjoy innovative consumer entertainment gameplay, and complete it in the shortest possible time to pass the level.

Game Features

1. This game has a rich and diverse gameplay, as well as a variety of levels that keep you from stopping.

2. The game is not limited by factors such as the internet, and can be played freely anytime and anywhere.
